name: BeautyMeditation
0:
”Alexa, open Beauty Meditation”
”Alexa, tell Beauty Meditation to play Makeup Meditation”
”Alexa, tell Beauty Meditation to play Moisturizing Meditation”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: beauty meditation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
[BEAUTY + MEDITATION TO ANTI-STRESS]
We all know that stress is one of the main causes for rapid premature aging of the skin and free radicals that is harmful for the skin and health. Meditation is one of the proven ways to reduce stress/cortisol secretion and slow down free radical production and premature aging.

[WELLNESS, WELLBEAUTY]
We made meditations simple and easy for many occasions with Beauty focused guided meditations and mindfulness techniques that help wellbeauty and provide balance to your life in just a few minutes a day.

[YOUR BEAUTY RITUAL]
Instead of rushing through your beauty routine, taking time to meditate on the process helps to regulate stress, clear your mind and benefit your skin because our skin is more receptive to what we deliver to it when it is not in a state of stress.

Only using the skincare products may not work fine for your complete wellbeauty, especially if you want to stay beautiful inside and outside. This app will help in pacifying the mind, balancing emotions, and reducing stress and anxiety which has become part and parcel of our life.
 
[HOW DOES IT WORK?]
Just tell your Alexa Skill to talk to Beauty Meditation.
 
You can simply say…...
“Alexa, open Beauty Meditation”
“Alexa, start skincare routine”
“Alexa, play Moisturizing meditation”
“Alexa, play Basic Beautitation”
“Alexa, play Makeup meditation”
“Alexa, play Stress free beautiful skin”
“Alexa, play With Respekt sheet mask”
“Alexa, play One of a kind beauty”
“Alexa, play Going through monthly period”
“Alexa, play Body, mind and spirit”
“Alexa, play Quote: Eyes, Lips, Poise”
“Alexa, play Brushing my hair”
 
[COMPLETE LIST OF CONTENTS]
Moisturizing meditation
2 minute relaxation
Basic Beautitation
Makeup meditation
Stress free beautiful skin
With Respekt sheet mask
One of a kind beauty
Going through monthly period
Body, mind and spirit
Quote: Eyes, Lips, Poise
Brushing my hair

*The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only
